org.jgentleframework.integration.remoting
Interface RemoteInvocation

All Superinterfaces:
SerializableMetadata
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteInvocationImpl
public interface RemoteInvocation
extends SerializableMetadata

Description of an remote invocation to a method, given to an interceptor upon method-call. Encapsulates a remote invocation, providing core method invocation properties in a serializable fashion.

Author:
Quoc Chung - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
SerializableMetadata
